title: 2 Bedroom Apartment Available in Rockridge ** FULL REMODEL **
posting_body: Proudly offered by Bay Apartment Advisors
This just remodeled two-bedroom unit is situated in the heart of Rockridge, one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Oakland.
It is located in between the Ashby and Rockridge Bart Stations and within easy walking distance of shops and restaurants, including Safeway, Wood Tavern, Noodle Theory, Zachary's, and many more.
Ample non-metered street parking is available.
**Please read entire ad before emailing questions.
Rental listings subject to change at any time.
